'''Make Haste, Partner''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]''.

It was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Story Quest]] ''[[Legend of the Darknight Hero]]'' and in certain challenges of the Story Domains [[Lost Treasure of Arcadia]] and [[The Reward for Courage is Flight]].
